definition: to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
flame/inflammation/-itis
to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached

sentences.english: I think it is no coincidence there sit 3 guys who say whatever their boss says.
sentences.chinese: 我想這三個趨炎附勢的傢伙能坐在老闆背後並非偶然。

sentences.english: The motive behind such words is austere rather than snobbish.
sentences.chinese: 使用這些字樣的動機是莊嚴肅穆而非趨炎附勢。

sentences.english: It is bad enough for a person to cravenly seek power while remaining in ignorance.
sentences.chinese: 一個人因爲無知而趨炎附勢就已經很糟糕了。

to speak incoherently/to ramble/to talk irresponsibly

to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action/a law unto oneself
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
